title: Nine Inch Nails: From The Fire
description:
A Nine Inch Nails fan single in an echoingthesound.org project. From The Fire is a compilation of fan remixes of My Violent Heart collected together by M J McLean [ets username mjmclean]. The tracks have been selected from hundreds as interesting, unique, or just plain incredible mixes of the title song.

Full artwork is provided in this download, and it is at 300 dpi for all your printing needs.

01 My Violent Heart - Prelude mix by Janek Leskiewicz 
02 My Violent Heart - IAMSTTB Remix by Shapermusic
03 My Violent Heart - Electropop Remix by Florian Bredl 
04 My Violent Heart - Unknown Citizen&#039;s Minimal Force Remix by Chaotix 
05 On Hands And Knees (My Violent Heart) by NLBshankR177 
06 Another Version Of The Truth - Silence Mix by M J McLean 
07 My Violent Heart - At The End Of Everything Mix by M J McLean 
08 My Violent Heart - Tamed Mix by Finneus J 
09 My Violent Heart - Regeneration Mix by Chris Rose 
10 My Violent Heart - Closing Credits Mix by Dont 

Total time: 40:33

Be sure to include no pauses between tracks when burning this CD, as some of the tracks flow into each other.

Artwork:
Front cover
Back cover
Full insert with wings
